original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽17.31. Sanidassanattika, Saṅkiliṭṭhattika🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho🔽nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  sani dassana ttika saṅkiliṭṭha ttika  anidassana appaṭigham saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ  na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha
translated: The forward and reverse order of conditions in relation to mental phenomena, The Paṭṭhāna text with the Tika commentary

original: adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho🔽naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho🔽naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
analyzed: adhipatiyā cha pe a vigate cha  a nidassana appaṭigham asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  anidassana appaṭigham asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ  na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha
adhipatiyā cha pe a vigate cha
